sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The main points of church-government and discipline; plainly and modestly handled by way of question and answer. Very useful to such as either want money to buy, or leasure to read larger tracts. Love, Christopher, 1618-1651.
[4], 58 p.
Printed by J.M. for Luke Favvne, and are to be sold at his shop at the Parrot ni [sic] pauls Church-yard, London : 1649.
Dedication signed: Christopher Love. Running title reads: A plain platform of Presbyterial government. Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan: 17 1648"; the 9 in the imprint date has been crossed out. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
